title: Exclusive Resorts Launches Strategic Partnership With The Ranch At Live Oak Malibu
text:
Exclusive Resorts
Club Expands VIP Benefits Providing Members with Access to Luxury Bootcamp
DENVER , Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Exclusive Resorts ®, a collection of 400+ luxury residences and experiences, recently announced the expansion of its health and wellness offerings by partnering with internationally acclaimed, results-driven fitness retreat, The Ranch at Live Oak Malibu. This new alliance provides Club members with access to the award-winning wellness program, its skilled professional staff and serene and luxurious accommodations.
"One of the best side effects of travel is that we get a mental break from everyday stresses and an opportunity for the brain to recharge," says Cathy Ross , CEO. "Exclusive Resorts recognizes that healthy bodies are just as important as healthy minds, and our partnership with The Ranch is perfect for members looking for a week-long detox without sacrificing the service or benefits they have come to expect from Exclusive Resorts."
As a result of this new partnership, Exclusive Resorts members will enjoy exclusive VIP perks when they book The Ranch at Live Oak Malibu's existing weeklong weight loss, wellness and nutritional program. Members-only benefits include a custom welcome basket and choice of a complimentary acupuncture treatment, chiropractic treatment or pre- and post-program cholesterol test. The Ranch will also host a series of fitness and wellness weekends for Exclusive Resorts members in Club residences - the first planned for Spring 2016 in Vail, Colorado .
"It is an honor to join the Exclusive Resorts portfolio of the world's leading luxury travel destinations and like-minded hospitality brands. This partnership is a testament to Exclusive Resorts' recognition of the growing consumer demand for wellness tourism, and The Ranch's position as a leader within this sector," says Alex Glasscock , founder of The Ranch at Live Oak Malibu. "We are thrilled to offer their members an unforgettable, transformative experience that mirrors the quality and service they expect from their traditional Exclusive Resorts getaways."
For more information on Exclusive Resorts, to request a brochure or to inquire about travel products and pricing, please contact 844.609.8684 or visit www.exclusiveresorts.com .
About Exclusive Resorts:
Exclusive Resorts is absolutely one of a kind. We are not merely a destination club, but a discerning and sophisticated community with a 13-year legacy providing our travelers with a distinctive lifestyle anchored by once-in-a-lifetime experiences. The private Club offers a suite of travel products and membership plans providing entree to the best the world has to offer: a vacation portfolio featuring more than 300 multimillion-dollar homes worldwide; curated experiences with exotic adventures spanning seven continents; privileged access to world-class VIP events; exclusive alliances with award-winning resort partners; and a collection of benefits and privileges with elite travel and luxury lifestyle brands. Founded in 2002 and acquired by Steve Case and Revolution Places in 2004, the Club has delivered nearly 200,000 vacations for its discerning travelers. For more information about Exclusive Resorts, visit exclusiveresorts.com or newsroom.exclusiveresorts.com , call 844.609.8684, and follow Exclusive Resorts on Facebook and Twitter .
About The Ranch at Live Oak / Malibu & The Ranch 4.0 at Four Seasons Hotel – Westlake Village
Opened in September 2010 , The Ranch at Live Oak / Malibu is a week-long, no-options, fitness and wellness program designed to recalibrate the mind and body through an intense physical regimen with a highly-structured diet of organic plant-based fare, paired with a full digital detox. Located three miles above the Pacific Ocean, the program combines four to five hours of group mountain hiking and afternoons filled with exercise classes and private massages daily. The Ranch also offers impressive amenities including luxurious private accommodations, an on-site organic garden, exercise pavilion and outdoor pool. In 2013 the program expanded to include The Ranch 4.0, a four-day abbreviated version of the acclaimed seven-day program. The Ranch 4.0 is designed for those looking to jump-start a healthier lifestyle but are unable to be away from home or work for a full week, and desire to maintain more connectivity during their program. In just five years since launch programs have developed a cult-like following with a 35% return rate, guests opting for single and multi-week stays, group and incentive travel buyouts and recognition at the top of domestic and international travel awards lists including Travel + Leisure Tatler, Spa Finder, Organic Spa and Lonely Planet.
